pullrequest.title: Add ruby script to convert manifest.xml to tsv for tutorial party spreadsheets

content.raw:
FYI, there are 3 tutorials listed under multiple categories:

~~~
$ grep '<tutorial>' manifest.xml  | sort | uniq -c | grep -v '^      1'
      2         <tutorial>aerodynamics</tutorial>
      2         <tutorial>hydrodynamics</tutorial>
      2         <tutorial>model_editor</tutorial>
~~~
